title: Key Changes
description: The changes between succeeding keys or the next following key.

rx.description: X position of rotation origin in key units.

ry.description: Y posiiton of rotation origin in key units

a.description: The alignment for label text, label sizes, label colors.

f.description: Default label size for succeeding keys.

f2.description: Optimized label size for succeeding keys.

c.description: Aligned cap CSS color for succeeding keys.

t.description: Aligned label CSS colors for succeeding keys.

x.description: X position of the raised primary shape in key units.

y.description: Y position of the raised primary shape in key units.

w.description: Width position of the raised primary shape in key units.

h.description: Height position of the raised primary shape in key units.

x2.description: X position offset of the lowered secondary shape in key units for the next key.

y2.description: Y position offset of lowered secondary shape in key units for the next key.

w2.description: Width of lowered secondary shape in key units for the next key.

h2.description: Height of lowered secondary shape in key units for the next key.

n.description: Whether the next key is a homing key.

l.description: Whether the next key is a stepped key.

d.description: Whether the next key is a decal key.

g.description: Whether succeeding keys are ghosted keys.
